alert.note: Alert for Lunenburg; Mecklenburg (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 17 at 5:50PM EDT until June 17 at 6:45PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wakefield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Mecklenburg County in south central Virginia... Lunenburg County in south central Virginia... * Until 645 PM EDT. * At 550 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Hampden Sydney College to near Keysville to near Cluster Springs to Prospect Hill, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Rehoboth around 605 PM EDT. Victoria and Lunenburg around 610 PM EDT. Kenbridge around 615 PM EDT. Dundas around 630 PM EDT. South Hill and La Crosse around 635 PM EDT. Brodnax around 640 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Bacons Fork, Wilburn, Spanish Grove, Gills Corner, Beechwood, Arvins Store, Finchley, Nutbush, Finneywood and Forksville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please report severe weather by calling 757-899-2415, posting to the NWS Wakefield Facebook page, or using Twitter @NWSWAKEFIELDVA.
